div.h4: Greetings from cyberspace! Just because we are having to stay socially distant, doesn’t mean that we can’t stay connected. Here are some useful information and links for making sure you can make the most of this distance learning adventure!

ul.li: Slow internet got you down? Tired of seeing websites spin and spin and never load? Try calling your cell phone provider! Some carriers are offering free wifi hotspots to help with these bandwidth bummers!
Any other tech issues? Try submitting a help request to the White Pine IT Help Ticket Service!
FAQ section! Woot! Let us know if you have any other questions!–This page is currently under construction!
Your daily dose of Mr. Graham in the form of today’s morning announcements!

WPCS/WPSA Office Hours:
Mon. 8-10
Tues. 11-1
Wed. 4-6
Thurs. 3-5
Fri. 2-4

div.h3: Link to WPSA Page–Lots of great resources for Distance Learning!

div.h2: Why Choose White Pine Charter School?

div.p: At White Pine, we’re pleased to provide a rich educational experience for our students. Our subjects are enhanced by a focus in specialized classes, which include Computers, Art, Music, and Physical Education. In addition to their science and mathematics courses, all of our middle school students are taking a STEM course as part of the core curriculum. This allows hands-on learning in science, technology, engineering and math, and our students learn how to think outside of the box.

p.a: Enroll your student at WPCS now
See what parents are saying about White Pine
We want you to be a part of our WPCS team
Find out what delicious meals our students will be eating
Our STEM Academy will prepare our junior high and high school students for careers in STEM related fields.
Check out our monthly newsletter for information and reminders
